dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1402 IH: Veterans Paralympic Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Coffman (for himself and Mr. Takano) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay a monthly assistance allowance to disabled veterans training or competing for the Paralympic Team and the authorization of appropriations for the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide assistance to United States Paralympics, Inc.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Veterans Paralympic Act of 2013 .

section.header: Extension of authorization of appropriations for payment of a monthly assistance allowance to disabled veterans training or competing for the Paralympic Team
section.text: Section 322(d)(4) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2018.

section.header: Extension of authorization of appropriations for assistance to United States Paralympics, Inc
section.text: Section 521A of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (g), by striking 2013 and inserting 2018; and
in subsection (l), by striking 2013 and inserting 2018.
